zone.line: them
For such, endures the life sustaining field
Its load of harvest, & their cattle yield
is filled
Large increase & the house with wealth
Such honn honoured dwell in cities fair & free
The homes of lovely women, prosperously
Their sons exult in youths new budding
gladness
And their fresh daughters free from
care or sadness
T With bloom-inwoven dance & happy song
meadow
On the soft flowers the bright green grass
among
by
Leap round them sporting — such delights from
thee

line.del: Those whom thou favoured favourest take

zone.line: Are given, rich Power, revered Divinity!
Mother of Gods, thou wife of starry
Heaven
Farewell! be thou propitious & be given
A happy life for this brief melody
Nor thou nor other songs shall
unremembered be
